name: Enter: The Grinch
summary:
The Grinch seeks to steal Christmas from Arlia Village - a locale from a JRPG called Star Ocean 2! This has homages to other IP's such as Doom, as well - so you could say it's a four-in-one crossover (even a five-in-one)!

Anyway, as Ranger comes to think of it - the Grinch looks kinda like an Archvile. And seeing that he's up to no good, it's time to put a stop to his evil plans - whatever that entails!
